EmailTemplate.name: Reeve Tea Campaign_090617
EmailTemplate.subject: Following up on the Livongo Tea Package
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope this note finds you well and you're settling into your post-Labor Day routine.
I wanted to quickly check in to see if you received the tea package I sent your way?
I hope all is well at {!Account.Name} and I hope to connect with you soon to discuss the possibility of offering Livongo to your employees with diabetes.
Do you have a few minutes to connect over the next few weeks?
Kind regards,
ADAM CLAYPOOL Director of Commercial Operations Livongo m: 314.346.2964 o: 312-357-5285 x143 e: aclaypool@livongo.com a: 444 N. Michigan Ave., Suite 2880, Chicago, IL 60611 www.livongo.com
